trans-unit.source: A test project was added to make running the tests a little easier. The old way of running the tests has been removed.

trans-unit.source: Add compatibility with Django 1.5 and Python 3.3. Note that this does not yet explicitly support Django 1.5’s new pluggable User models in any particular way.

trans-unit.source: Compatibility fixes for Django <1.2
trans-unit.target: Django <1.2的兼容性修补程序

trans-unit.source: Correct a duplicated test
trans-unit.target: 纠正重复的测试

trans-unit.source: Drop support for Django 1.6 and earlier
trans-unit.target: 放弃对Django 1.6及以前的支持。

trans-unit.source: Drop support for Django prior to 2.1.2 (#60 thanks LaundroMat)
trans-unit.target: 取消对2.1.2之前的Django支持(#60 感谢LaundroMat)

trans-unit.source: ENABLE_LAZYSIGNUP
trans-unit.target: ENABLE_LAZYSIGNUP

trans-unit.source: Fix URL patterns for 1.10.0 compat (#49 ,thanks kevinmickey and nschlemm)
trans-unit.target: 修正1.10.0版本的URL模式 (#49,thanks kevinmickey and nschlemm)

trans-unit.source: Fix a RST issue in README
trans-unit.target: 修正README中的RST问题

trans-unit.source: Fix a bug where a new user would not be created if they already had a session key.
trans-unit.target: 修正了一个错误,即如果新用户已经有了会话密钥,则不会创建新用户。

trans-unit.source: Fix a packaging error. Thanks to Tamas Mako (tomako) for reporting it.
trans-unit.target: 修正一个包装错误。感谢Tamas Mako(tomako)的报告。

trans-unit.source: Fix an issue where a POST to the convert view would break if the user was anonymous. The convert view now redirects to the LOGIN_URL by default, parameterised in the view.
trans-unit.target: 修复了一个问题,如果用户是匿名的,对转换视图的POST会中断。转换视图现在默认重定向到LOGIN_URL,在视图中进行参数化。

trans-unit.source: Fix an issue where a lazy user would be misidentified as a non-lazy user
trans-unit.target: 修正懒人用户被误认为非懒人用户的问题。

trans-unit.source: Fix another packaging error. Thanks to David Eyk (eykd) for the pull request.
trans-unit.target: 修复另一个包装错误。感谢 David Eyk (eykd)的拉取请求。

trans-unit.source: Fix dependency on incorrect version of
trans-unit.target: 修正对不正确版本的依赖性

trans-unit.source: Fix packaging and docs errors.
trans-unit.target: 修复包装和文档错误。

trans-unit.source: Fix packaging error.
trans-unit.target: 修复包装错误。

trans-unit.source: Fix packaging issue
trans-unit.target: 修复包装问题

trans-unit.source: Fix small error in setup.py classifiers, as we now only support Django 1.10 and above.
trans-unit.target: 修正setup.py分类器中的小错误,因为我们现在只支持Django 1.10及以上版本。

trans-unit.source: Fix some packaging errors
trans-unit.target: 修正一些包装错误

trans-unit.source: For those who use it, a South migration is provided to create the initial table. Data migration will be handled by South migrations from now on.
trans-unit.target: 对于使用它的人,提供了一个南迁移来创建初始表。从现在开始,数据迁移将由南迁移处理。

trans-unit.source: Generated usernames are now based on the session key, rather than actually being the session key. This is to avoid a potential security issue where an app might simply display a username, giving away a significant part of the user’s session key. The username is now generated from a SHA1 hash of the session key. This change means that existing generated users will become invalid.
trans-unit.target: 现在，生成的用户名基于会话密钥，而不是实际上是会话密钥。这是为了避免潜在的安全问题，即应用程序可能仅显示用户名，从而放弃了用户会话密钥的很大一部分。现在，用户名是从会话密钥的SHA1哈希生成的。此更改意味着现有的生成用户将变得无效。

trans-unit.source: Initial release
trans-unit.target: 初次发布

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: 介紹

trans-unit.source: It also introduces a new feature, user agent blacklisting. This aims to prevent explosive growth in the number of users created by search engines, etc. This feature is still in test, so patches and feedback welcome. Note that this introduces a backwards-incompatibly behaviour. Prior to this release, it was safe to assume that all views marked with the
trans-unit.target: 它还引入了一个新功能,用户代理黑名单。这样做的目的是防止搜索引擎等创建的用户数量爆发式增长。这个功能还在测试中,欢迎打补丁和反馈。请注意,这引入了一个向后不兼容的行为。在此版本之前,可以放心地认为所有标有

trans-unit.source: Note that this release is the last feature release that will support Django 1.2 or earlier. 0.9.0 and later will require Django 1.3 or later.

trans-unit.source: Removed the hard dependency on session keys to generate usernames, as it was unnecessary.
trans-unit.target: 删除了生成用户名时对会话密钥的硬性依赖,因为它是不必要的。

trans-unit.target: 感谢Alex Ehlke的报告和补丁。

trans-unit.source: Thanks to Brad Beattie (bradbeattie) for the implementation and tests, and to Adam Coddington (latestrevision) for the original suggestion.
trans-unit.target: 感谢Brad Beattie(bradbeattie)的实现和测试,感谢Adam Coddington(lastrevision)的原始建议。

trans-unit.source: Thanks to Brad Pitcher for this work.
trans-unit.target: 感谢Brad Pitcher的工作。

trans-unit.source: Thanks to Luke Zapart for the idea and initial implementation.
trans-unit.target: 感谢Luke Zapart的想法和初步实施。

trans-unit.source: The
trans-unit.target: The

trans-unit.source: The LazySignupBackend no longer relies on a specific User class to authenticate a user. It now uses the fact that there is a relationship between the LazyUser and the main site User class. This fixes the bug where authenticate() was looking directly for UNUSABLE_PASSWORD, and also paves the way for custom user classes.
trans-unit.target: LazySignupBackend不再依赖特定的User类来验证用户。现在它使用了LazyUser和主站User类之间存在关系的事实。这修复了authenticate()直接寻找UNUSABLE_PASSWORD的bug,也为自定义用户类铺平了道路。

trans-unit.source: The canonical import location of
trans-unit.target: 的规范导入位置。

trans-unit.source: The convert view is now itself lazy
trans-unit.target: 现在的转换视图本身就是懒惰的

trans-unit.source: The following bugs have been fixed:
trans-unit.target: 修复了以下错误。

trans-unit.source: The following features have been added:
trans-unit.target: 增加了以下功能:

trans-unit.target: 测试模块现在包括一个

trans-unit.source: There is now also an
trans-unit.target: 现在还有一个

trans-unit.source: These changes are somewhat experimental, so this is a beta release - it is not recommended that you run this in production. Testing and feedback is welcome.
trans-unit.target: 这些更改在某种程度上是实验性的，因此这是一个beta版本- 不建议您在生产中运行它。欢迎测试和反馈。

trans-unit.source: This change means that you can no longer disable the software by removing the middleware class from your configuration. You might want to do this temporarily in development, for example, when testing that your views still work when an anonymous user is presented to them (perhaps through the user agent blacklisting functionality).
trans-unit.target: 这个变化意味着你不能再通过从配置中删除中间件类来禁用软件。您可能希望在开发中暂时这样做,例如,当测试您的视图在呈现给匿名用户时仍然可以工作时(可能通过用户代理黑名单功能)。

trans-unit.source: This is a bugfix and feature release. The internal API has changed to no longer depend on session keys for username generation. This should be backwards-compatible as long as you are using the documented API.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个错误修正和功能发布。内部API已经改变,不再依赖会话密钥来生成用户名。只要你使用的是文档化的API,这应该是向后兼容的。

trans-unit.source: This is a bugfix release, which included some docs omitted from the 0.10.0 release.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个bug修复的版本,其中包含了一些0.10.0版本中遗漏的文档。

trans-unit.source: This is a bugfix release. Issues fixed:
trans-unit.target: 这是一个错误修正版本。修正的问题。

trans-unit.source: This is a compatibility release with Django 1.10.0. This is now the minimum supported version. If you require compatibility with versions below that, please use version 1.0.2.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个与Django 1.10.0兼容的版本。这是目前支持的最低版本。如果你需要与低于这个版本的版本兼容,请使用1.0.2版本。

trans-unit.source: This is a docs-only release. Docs have converted to Sphinx, for easier navigation.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个只有文档的版本。文档已转换为Sphinx,便于浏览。

trans-unit.source: This is a feature release. A custom signal is now fired when a user is converted. Thanks to Olly Smith (oesmith) for the patch.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个功能发布。现在,当用户转换时,一个自定义信号会被发射。感谢Olly Smith(oesmith)提供的补丁。

trans-unit.source: This is a feature release. This contains all the features in the 0.8.0 beta series, plus the ability to specify custom templates for the convert view, both via a regular GET and via Ajax. Thanks to percyperez for the idea and initial implementation.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个功能发布。它包含了0.8.0测试版系列中的所有功能,加上通过常规GET和通过Ajax为转换视图指定自定义模板的能力。感谢 percyperez 的想法和最初的实现。

trans-unit.source: remove_expired_users should no longer depend on using the database session backend - it will instead use SESSION_COOKIE_AGE to find lazy users who have not logged in recently and whose sessions will therefore have expired.

trans-unit.source: template filter, which will return True if the current user is an automatically created user. It will return False for users who are anonymous, or were authenticated by some other means. Thanks again to Jauco Noordzij for the idea for this feature.
